name: Appart'City Confort Montpellier Saint Roch
description:
Appart'City Montpellier - Saint Roch is located near Montpellier's historic city centre, a 15-minute walk from Place de la Comédie and Montpellier central train station. It offers air-conditioned apartments and on-site parking. Free WiFi is available in public areas, while cabled Internet is provided in apartments.

Apartments at Appart'City Montpellier - Saint Roch have a flat-screen TV with Chromecast and private bathroom. Each apartment also has a fully-equipped kitchenette with a microwave and fridge. All apartments can be accessed by an elevator.

A buffet breakfast is served daily on site. Breakfast is composed of various breads, pastries, fresh and hot beverages. Fresh fruit and fruit salad, as well as cheeses and yogurts are also provided. Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception desk.

The hotel is conveniently located just 300 metres from Nouveau Saint-Roch tram stop offering a direct transport link to the central station. Montpellier’s Arc de Triomphe is a 20-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Joli studio centre historique et au calme (2)
address: 7 Rue du Général Claparède, 34000 Montpellier, France
description:
Joli studio centre historique et au calme (2) in Montpellier provides accommodation with free WiFi, 1.1 km from Place de la Comédie, less than 1 km from Montpellier Cathedral of Saint Peter and 2.9 km from Montpellier Town Hall. The property is around 1.4 km from The Corum, 1.2 km from Fabre Museum and 3.6 km from GGL Stadium. The property is 800 metres from the city centre and 800 metres from Montpellier National Opera.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a balcony with quiet street views. The unit at the property features a shower and a dressing room. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Odysseum Shopping Centre is 5.2 km from the apartment, while Agrolpolis International is 6.9 km away. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 10 km from Joli studio centre historique et au calme (2).

name: ibis Grenoble Centre Bastille
address: 5 rue Miribel - Tramway Victor Hugo, 38000 Grenoble, France
description:
Located in the centre of Grenoble, ibis Grenoble Centre offers a 24-hour reception bar and free Wi-Fi access throughout. Victor Hugo Tramway is situated outside the hotel and the Bastille Cable Car is 500 metres away.

All rooms are air-conditioned and feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a wardrobe, a desk and a telephone. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00.

Additional features include luggage storage, daily newspapers and an elevator. Victor Hugo Square is 100 metres away and private parking is possible on site.

name: Garden in the city - Train station/City center
description:
Garden in the city - Train station/City center, a property with a garden and a terrace, is situated in Grenoble, 700 metres from WTC Grenoble, 6.6 km from AlpExpo, as well as 3 km from Alps Stadium. The property is set 5.3 km from The Bastille Grenoble, 6.8 km from Summum and 32 km from Col de Parménie. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Grenoble Train Station is 600 metres away.

The 2-bedroom apartment features a living room with a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 45 km from the apartment.

name: Appartement cosy dans les rues piétonnes
description:
In the Grenoble City Centre district of Grenoble, close to WTC Grenoble, Appartement cosy dans les rues piétonnes has free WiFi and a washing machine. The property is around 5.4 km from AlpExpo, 1.3 km from Alps Stadium and 2 km from The Bastille Grenoble. The property is 200 metres from the city centre and 1.3 km from Grenoble Train Station.

name: Adagio Grenoble Centre
description:
Adagio Grenoble Centre is located in the Europole business district of Grenoble, a 5-minute walk from the city’s TGV Train Station and a 10-minute walk from the city centre. With studios and suites, it offers free WiFi access, a fitness room and a sauna.

All the contemporary studios and suites are equipped with interactive TV and a fully equipped kitchen.

Adagio Grenoble Centre serves a daily continental breakfast as well as full concierge services.

Grenobles old town and Notre Dame Cathedral are within easy walking distance. The A480 motorway is 1.3 kilometres away for guests exploring the Rhone-Alpes region by car.

name: Appartements Residilaverde Gare
description:
Located in the heart of Grenoble, Appartement Residilaverde Gare proposes self-catering accommodation just 100 metres from the train station and 900 metres from Bastille Cable Car.

All accommodation is air-conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, free Wi-Fi access, a washing machine and a dryer. They are complete with a private bathroom.

The fully equipped kitchen in each apartment includes a coffee machine, refrigerator, oven, kettle and a toaster. Restaurants and bars can be found within walking distance.

Mistral Park is a 20-mintue walk from the accommodation. Private parking is possible on site.

name: Chambre au Cœur Grenoble - Calme & Tout Equipé avec WIFI
description:
Featuring accommodation with a balcony, Chambre au Cœur Grenoble - Calme & Tout Equipé avec WIFI is located in Grenoble. The property is set 1.2 km from WTC Grenoble, 6 km from AlpExpo and 3.8 km from Alps Stadium. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Grenoble Train Station is 1.1 km away.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen and 1 bathroom. A flat-screen TV is provided. The accommodation is non-smoking.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

The Bastille Grenoble is 5.6 km from the apartment, while Summum is 6.2 km away. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 45 km from Chambre au Cœur Grenoble - Calme & Tout Equipé avec WIFI.

name: ibis Grenoble Gare
description:
Set just 200 metres from Grenoble Train Station, ibis Grenoble Gare offers air-conditioned rooms with mountain views and free Wi-Fi. It has a 24-hour reception and you can enjoy a drink from the bar. It is a 5-minute walk from the city centre.

Decorated in a modern style, the guest rooms all include an LCD TV with satellite channels. Each is soundproofed and has  a telephone, desk and a private bathroom complete with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast composed of sweet and savoury dishes such as eggs, fruit salad, yogurts and juices is served every day. Pastries baked on site and fresh French Madeleine cakes are also on offer, as well as a hot beverage and a piece of fruit to take away. Outside of regular breakfast hours guests can also enjoy a lighter option, available from 04:00. Snacks and drinks can be ordered at any time from the 24-hour reception.

Private parking is available on site, at an extra cost. Grenoble Museum is only 1 km away and the Fort de la Bastille is 2 km from the hotel. Traditional French restaurants can be found within 400 metres.The property is 1.5 km from A480 highway.

name: La loge parisienne 300m gare Bastille Téléphérique
description:

description:

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Guests at the apartment will be able to enjoy activities in and around Grenoble, like walking tours.

AlpExpo is 6.6 km from Hyper centre Grenoble, while Alps Stadium is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 47 km from the accommodation.

name: Les baleines - hypercentre 2 chambres avec garage et clim - air conditioning
address: 24 bis Rue des Bergers, 38000 Grenoble, France
description:
Situated 1.1 km from Grenoble Train Station and 1.4 km from WTC Grenoble in the centre of Grenoble, Les baleines - hypercentre 2 chambres avec garage et clim - air conditioning features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property has garden and inner courtyard views, and is 1.7 km from Alps Stadium. The property is non-smoking and is set 5.2 km from AlpExpo.

The air-conditioned apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and a coffee machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower and slippers. A flat-screen TV is available. The apartment offers bed linen, towels and laundry service.

Skiing, walking tours and bike tours are possible within the area, and the apartment offers ski storage space.

The Bastille Grenoble is 4.7 km from Les baleines - hypercentre 2 chambres avec garage et clim - air conditioning, while Summum is 5.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 46 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-centre
description:
Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-centre is located in the heart of Grenoble and is the oldest hotel in the city. It is set in a 17th-century building. Free WiFi is provided.

All rooms are air-conditioned and soundproofed. They come with a flat-screen TV with Bein Sports, Canal+ and Eurosport satellite channels. Some rooms also feature a balcony with views of the city.

Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-centre offers a daily continental breakfast, which can also be served in the guest room upon request.

Hôtel de l'Europe Grenoble hyper-centre is 350 metres from the cable car that goes up to the Bastille. Grenoble train station is 1 km away, or a 5-minute journey by tram. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Hôtel d’Angleterre Grenoble Hyper-Centre
description:
Hôtel d’Angleterre Grenoble Hyper-Centre is set in the heart of Grenoble, opposite the gardens of Place Victor Hugo. It is just a 1-minute walk to the Victor Hugo tram stop and offers free WiFi and an onsite bar .

All the rooms are soundproofed and air-conditioned. They feature a desk, a LCD satellite TV and a DVD player. The private bathrooms come with free toiletries. Some rooms also have a hydro-massage bathtub and a private balcony with views over the Vercors mountain range.

A buffet breakfast is available every day and includes hot, cold, sweet and savoury options. An other continental breakfast option consisting of a hot drink, a juice, a pasty, bread, butter and jam is also available.

An underground car park is available nearby at an extra charge.  The nearest airport is Grenoble - Isère Airport, 45 km from the accommodation.

name: Le Grand Hôtel Grenoble, BW Premier Collection by Best Western
address: 5 rue de la Republique, 38000 Grenoble, France
description:
In the heart of the historic city centre of the Capital of the Alps, the Grand Hôtel de Grenoble **** BW Premier Collection is waiting to welcome you to an unforgettable experience.

Whether you are on a business trip or a sporting getaway, our attentive and dedicated team is here to offer you a quality of service that lives up to your expectations and up-to-date facilities.

Relax in our newly refurbished rooms and suites. Enjoy a breakfast of fresh, local and seasonal produce. Bring your best projects to life in our coworking space.
At the Grand Hôtel de Grenoble **** BW Premier Collection, every detail is carefully orchestrated to make your stay an unforgettable experience. We look forward to welcoming you and offering you an exceptional stay in Grenoble.

Our hotel is located in the heart of a pedestrianised street, and can be reached by public transport or by car by parking in the Saint-Claire Les Halles private car park, formerly the Lafayette car park (preferential rate).

Le Bon Quai features a terrace and is set in Grenoble, within just 1.1 km of WTC Grenoble and 1.6 km of The Bastille Grenoble. It is situated 5.9 km from AlpExpo and features a lift. The property is 800 metres from Grenoble Train Station, and within 600 metres of the city centre.

Guest rooms at the Maison Barbillon Grenoble have an authentic and elegant décor and feature a private bathroom including a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning in the breakfast room. There are many restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.

Maison Barbillon is accessible via the A480 motorway. The hotel is located beside Grenoble World Trade Centre and Saint-André Cathedral is just a 13-minute walk away.

description:
500 metres from AlpExpo, COWOOL GRENOBLE is a recently renovated property situated in Grenoble and features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. Boasting a lift, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The aparthotel has family rooms and facilities for disabled guests.

Each unit has a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a seating area, a TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with bath and a hair dryer. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. At the aparthotel, units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

There is a coffee shop, and packed lunches are also available. During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

Fitness classes are available at the property. A bicycle rental service is available at the aparthotel.

Grenoble Train Station is 5.2 km from COWOOL GRENOBLE, while WTC Grenoble is 6.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 50 km from the accommodation.

name: 10min Gare Grenoble, vrai lit double, calme
description:
10min Gare Grenoble, vrai lit double, calme is set in Grenoble, 5 km from AlpExpo, 3 km from Alps Stadium, and 5.2 km from Summum. It is located 1.9 km from WTC Grenoble and provides a lift. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Grenoble Train Station is 1.8 km away.

The apartment features 1 bedroom, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, a washing machine, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

The Bastille Grenoble is 6.7 km from the apartment, while Col de Parménie is 33 km away. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 46 km from 10min Gare Grenoble, vrai lit double, calme.

name: Les Appartements de Grenoble
description:
Situated conveniently in Grenoble, Les Appartements de Grenoble offers a buffet breakfast and free WiFi. The property features mountain and garden views, and is 1.9 km from Grenoble Train Station. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace.

Each unit is fitted with a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a washing machine, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The units at the aparthotel feature air conditioning and a desk.

The family-friendly restaurant at the aparthotel serves local cuisine, and is open for dinner and lunch. During the colder months, guests can enjoy winter sports in the surrounding area.

A bicycle rental service is available at Les Appartements de Grenoble.

WTC Grenoble is 2.7 km from the accommodation, while AlpExpo is 6.3 km away. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 46 km from Les Appartements de Grenoble.

name: 1924 Hôtel
description:
Located in the heart of Grenoble on a quiet street, only 450 metres from the SNCF train station and offers free WiFi, service clean, comfortable rooms with modern facilities and a friendly, relaxed atmosphere.

All the cosy guest rooms are equipped with all modern amneties, en suite facilities, soundproofing and satellite TV. All rooms are served by a small lift. Some allow you to see the mountain Vercors.

 The helpful staff at this delightful hotel will help you to make the most of your visit. Local and Bio breakfast is served every morning. Guests can find restaurants nearby.

Explore Grenoble on foot, with our bikes available, or using the excellent public transport links. Guests will appreciate the tramwa stop just a stone's throw from the hotel, providing easy access to the city's business districts and famous sites

name: RockyPop Grenoble Hotel
description:
Situated in Grenoble, 1.6 km from Grenoble Train Station, RockyPop Grenoble Hotel features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna. The property is 1.9 km from WTC Grenoble, and within 600 metres of the city centre.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast can be enjoyed at the property.

You can play table tennis at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire is available.

Speaking English and French, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the 24-hour front desk.

AlpExpo is 4.8 km from RockyPop Grenoble Hotel, while Alps Stadium is less than 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 48 km from the accommodation.

name: Hôtel Victoria
description:
Ideally set in the centre of Grenoble, Hôtel Victoria offers free WiFi throughout the property and free private parking for guests who drive. The property is situated 1.2 km from WTC Grenoble, 5.2 km from AlpExpo and 1.8 km from Alps Stadium. The property is non-smoking and is set less than 1 km from Grenoble Train Station.

At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower and free toiletries. At Hôtel Victoria the rooms come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels.

The Bastille Grenoble is 4.7 km from the accommodation, while Summum is 5.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Alpes–Isère Airport, 46 km from Hôtel Victoria.

name: Eklo Montpellier Centre Gare
description:
Ideally located in the centre of Montpellier, Eklo Montpellier Centre Gare offers air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and a terrace. Private parking is available on site.

At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. All guest rooms feature a private bathroom, free toiletries and bed linen.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Eklo Montpellier Centre Gare.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Montpellier Town Hall, Montpellier National Opera and Place de la Comédie. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 9 km from Eklo Montpellier Centre Gare.

name: Suite indépendante avec 1 chambre et 1 bureau
description:
Located 1.1 km from Montpellier National Opera and 1.4 km from Place de la Comédie in the centre of Montpellier, Suite indépendante avec 1 chambre et 1 bureau provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. With garden views, this accommodation features a terrace. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.3 km from Montpellier Cathedral of Saint Peter.

Towels and bed linen are provided in the bed and breakfast.

Guests can also relax in the garden.

GGL Stadium is 2.9 km from the bed and breakfast, while Montpellier Town Hall is 3.2 km away. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 10 km from Suite indépendante avec 1 chambre et 1 bureau.

name: Charmant Studio Neuf N•2 - Centre ville
address: 23 Rue du Plan de l'Olivier, 34000 Montpellier, France
description:
Situated in Montpellier, 400 metres from Fabre Museum and 700 metres from Place de la Comédie, Charmant Studio Neuf N•2 - Centre ville provides accommodation with amenities such as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. The property is around 3 km from Montpellier Town Hall, 400 metres from Montpellier Cathedral of Saint Peter and 700 metres from Montpellier National Opera. The property is 600 metres from The Corum, and within 400 metres of the city centre.

The apartment is composed of 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchenette, and 1 bathroom. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. The accommodation is non-smoking.

Odysseum Shopping Centre is 4.3 km from the apartment, while Agrolpolis International is 6.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 9 km from Charmant Studio Neuf N•2 - Centre ville.

name: Ravissant T3 Neuf Climatisé - Centre ville
address: 23 Rue du Plan de l'Olivier, 34000 Montpellier, France
description:
In the heart of Montpellier, set within a short distance of The Corum and Fabre Museum, Ravissant T3 Neuf Climatisé - Centre ville offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a microwave and coffee machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a balcony. The property is non-smoking and is situated 700 metres from Place de la Comédie.

This apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Montpellier Town Hall is 3 km from the apartment, while Montpellier Cathedral of Saint Peter is 400 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 9 km from Ravissant T3 Neuf Climatisé - Centre ville.

name: Artistic Loft, Downtown Montpellier, WIFI
description:
Right in the centre of Montpellier, situated within a short distance of Montpellier National Opera and Montpellier Cathedral of Saint Peter, Artistic Loft, Downtown Montpellier, WIFI offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a toaster and coffee machine. This apartment features accommodation with a patio. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from Place de la Comédie.

The spacious apartment with a terrace and garden views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment. There is also a seating area and a fireplace.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

The Corum is 1.7 km from the apartment, while Fabre Museum is 1.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 10 km from Artistic Loft, Downtown Montpellier, WIFI.

name: Le temps d'un passage
description:
In the heart of Montpellier, set within a short distance of Place de la Comédie and The Corum, Le temps d'un passage offers free WiFi, air conditioning and household amenities such as a dishwasher and coffee machine. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a patio. The property is non-smoking and is situated 2.2 km from Montpellier Town Hall.

The apartment is fitted with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with city views. The unit at the property features a bath and a dressing room. For added privacy, the accommodation features a private entrance.

Popular points of interest near the apartment include Fabre Museum, Montpellier National Opera and Montpellier Cathedral of Saint Peter. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 9 km from Le temps d'un passage.

name: Au cœur de M
description:
Well located in the centre of Montpellier, Au cœur de M offers a balcony, air conditioning, free WiFi and flat-screen TV. The property features city views and is 400 metres from Montpellier National Opera and 700 metres from The Corum. The property is non-smoking and is located 2 km from Montpellier Town Hall.

Towels and bed linen are provided in the bed and breakfast. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing.

A continental breakfast is available daily at the bed and breakfast. There is a coffee shop on-site.

Popular points of interest near Au cœur de M include Fabre Museum, Place de la Comédie and Montpellier Cathedral of Saint Peter. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Joli studio avec terrasse-jardin sur les toits, coeur historique
address: 4 eme etage 7 Rue des Teissiers, 34000 Montpellier, France
description:
Located in the centre of Montpellier, just 700 metres from Montpellier Cathedral of Saint Peter and less than 1 km from The Corum, Joli studio avec terrasse-jardin sur les toits, coeur historique provides accommodation with city views and free WiFi. Guests staying at this apartment have access to a terrace. Outdoor dining is also possible at the apartment.

The apartment is equipped with 1 bedroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and 1 bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are provided in the apartment. This apartment is non-smoking and soundproof.

Popular points of interest near Joli studio avec terrasse-jardin sur les toits, coeur historique include Fabre Museum, Place de la Comédie and Montpellier National Opera. The nearest airport is Montpellier - Mediterranee Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel d'Aragon
description:
Situé au cœur de Montpellier, l'hôtel d'Aragon offre un cadre élégant et une situation privilégiée pour découvrir le patrimoine artistique, culturel et historique de la ville.

Les chambres personnalisées de l'hôtel d'Aragon sont spacieuses, insonorisées et équipées d'une télévision à écran plat ( chromecast ), d'un accès Internet gratuit, pour certaines, de douches hydrojets, minibar, machine à café et d'une baignoire balnéo.

Pour le délicieux petit déjeuner nous privilégions des produits de qualités, des produits bio de préférence, sous forme de buffet qui est servi tous les jours dans la véranda au toit de verre, il devient un salon confortable baigné de lumière naturelle l'après midi pour un petit moment de convivialité.

L'Hôtel d'Aragon bénéficie d'une situation privilégiée à 500 mètres de la gare TGV Saint Roch, à proximité de la place de la Comédie, de l'Opéra et du centre de conférences Corum.
